start.text: It's nothin' personal. We just need the supplies.
That's a nice hull they got there. Maybe we could add it to the collection?
Try not to break em' apart. We could use a couple of those hulls.

start_boss.text: That one's really something. I wonder if we could recover it...
Well, look at you. I'd bet you're just full of artifacts. Nanoforges, AI cores, relic components...

retreat.text: Gettin' out of here. Better to lose some spare parts than the entire hull.
Retreating. I hope it's worth it.

out_of_missiles.text: That's all our missiles. You sure we expanded those racks?
...And that's the last missile. Hope we used em' well.

engaged.text: Engaging! You look like you'll make some nice spare parts.
Alright. Time to earn our share of the loot.
Hah, this one looks like some good salvage.

need_help.text: This one is givin' us some trouble. Must be hiding something good.
Need some help here, or we'll need to waste some of the salvage on patching.
Could use some support. When we win this, I'd like to take a look at those guns.

pursuing.text: That one's running! Must have something good on em'.
Chase em' down. That one's a fine hull.
Take that one down. Can't wait to carve up that hold of theirs.

running.text: Damn it, we're pullin' out for a second.
They're putting up a fight. We'll back off for a bit.

hull_90.text: Armor's breached. I'm gonna have to fix that stuff later.
They're gettin' our soft hull. Kill em', so we don't need to waste our supplies.

hull_50.text: This isn't good. Hull's taking some heavy hits.
This is gonna take a fortune in supplies to patch up...
Crew's welding as fast as they can. We'll hold together.

hull_30.text: Damn them! I'll rip that hull up for parts first!
Ship's critical! There's too much heat for any repairs!
Son of a... Must be trying to keep us away from some real good tech.
That one hit the hold. We're losing precious salvage...

overload.text: Damn those Mark 8 capacitors. Shoulda gone with the others...
Overloaded. Gonna replace the conduits with ones ripped from the bastard who did that.
Systems are fried. Keep us covered so we can harvest those hulls.

death.text: Seal the bulkheads! I need to- *Static*
Better hope we can recover this hull...

victory.text: Heh hah hah. These'll make for some good repairs.
Nice, nice. Think I see a fuel cell over there we can use, and a container of spare parts...
Let's see what we'll find here. Blueprints, production chips, weapons...
Excellent... Now, we strip em' for all they're worth.

victory_boss.text: There's gonna be something good in there!
Must be some high value composites...
